name: Stein Paradox
description:
Stein Paradox

200 years after the creation of the Theory of Relativity, humanity creates the Stein Reactor, a machine that converts matter into antimatter.

During the testing of the Stein Reactor something gone wrong, reality and non-reality merge together. Jena the main character of this story is the only human being able to travel between the two dimensions: her mission is to find the Stein Reactor and destroy it.

Instructions

Use W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys for Jump e Move.

If you like my projects and my art follow me on twitter   https://twitter.com/Chris_LainoT_T
